item.title: Low Testosterone
item.description: Testosterone is the key hormone needed for a healthy man. With age it is normal for testosterone production to decline in the body, but when it is running low it can throw certain functions off balance. Testosterone is needed for healthy muscles, bone strength, and for a strong libido. We specialize in treating “Low T” (low testosterone) to restore your well being and quality of life as a man. What is Testosterone?

item.title: About Us
item.description: Z Med Clinic is a well established medical practice with clinics in 5 different locations throughout Houston, Corpus Christi and San Antonio, TX. It is one of the foremost medical clinics in Texas, providing medical support and health relief for the greater community. Our goal is to keep you and your family healthy and happy, our patients have always come first and are always treated in a confidential, sensitive and comforting manner.

item.title: What type of franchise is available?
item.description: ZMED Clinic is offering single location franchises for the operation of a single ZMED Clinic, and Area Developer agreements for the development and operation of multiple locations within an exclusive territory.

item.title: Hormone Therapy San Antonio, Houston - ZMedClinic

item.title: How much is the fee for continuing support services?
item.description: There is an ongoing royalty fee that is equal to 6% of the monthly gross revenues that are derived from your sales at your clinic. This fee gives you the right to continue the use of ZMEDClinic name and trademarks, have access to the operating manual updates, receive continuous marketing assistance, and receive other benefits such as low product costs.

item.title: How much dose the franchise cost?
item.description: The estimated total investment for each ZMED Clinic ranges between $105,250 and $347,400. This includes the initial franchise fee. The franchise fee will help cover the cost of the initial training, opening assistance, the operations manual, and other support and franchise development services.

item.title: How much training is provided?
item.description: You and up to three managing partners will participate in an initial training session lasting for a duration of up to a 8 days. It will be split between classroom training and on-the-job training. There is no additional cost for this training. You are responsible for your own travel expenses.

item.title: What about advertising?
item.description: Building the brand and the reputation of ZMED Clinic is a crucial element for the success of your store. You will be required to spend a minimum initial amount on grand opening advertising. You will contribute to a national marketing campaign at a rate of 2% of your gross revenue.

item.title: What is the term of the ZMED Clinic franchise agreement?
item.description: The term of the ZMED Clinic franchise agreement is 10 years, renewable for two additional 5 year terms.

item.title: Lizy R Testimonial

item.title: Will I have an exclusive territory?
item.description: Yes. Your exclusive territory will be a radius of five miles or a population of 40,000 people, whichever is the lesser between clinics.

item.title: Meyer's Cocktail
item.description: What is Meyer's Cocktail? This is an IV therapy that is nutrient-based and is used to fill the body with nutrients including vitamins and minerals among others. It is primarily used as an energy booster, which allows the safe passage of a high dose of nutrients directly to the patient’s bloodstream, making it easier to be absorbed.

item.title: Poly MVA
item.description: What is Poly MVA? The Poly MVA infusion therapy is an alternative to traditional cancer treatment. This IV therapy uses a complex formula rich with non-toxic antioxidants together with vitamins, minerals, amino acids, and other ingredients. Poly MVA therapy is believed to strengthen the body’s ability to repair itself at the cellular level by facilitating energy transfer to the cells through its redox molecules.

item.title: Vitamin C therapy
item.description: Vitamin C therapy is one of the most common forms of intravenous therapy, widely used in conjunction with traditional cancer treatment. Please call us at 281-292-3030 for a free detailed consultation over the phone.

item.title: Chelation Therapy
item.description: Chelation Therapy when compared to bypass surgery is a cost-efficient alternative that is comparatively safe and has been used in the US since the 1940’s.

item.title: IV Infusion Therapy
item.description: What is IV Infusion Therapy? Intravenous or IV infusion therapy refers to the slow infusion of a nutrients and other compounds which are administered directly into your blood stream via the vein. By intravenously injecting the nutrients and medication, the digestive system is bypassed, which provides for a very effective delivery method. The IV administration allows for faster absorption of the medication and avoids losses in the digestive system that occur when the same nutrient and medication are ingested orally.

item.title: Ozone Therapy
item.description: Ozone Therapy IV Ozone Therapy is the removal of a small sample of the patient’s blood, diluting it with saline, and enriching it with the addition of ozone. The ozone is produced in an ozone generator from medical-grade oxygen gas, creating O3, which attaches to the red blood cells. Virus, bacteria, parasites, and fungus cannot live in this highly oxygenated environment. Indications and Possible Benefits:
